item.title: How to change NPC drop rate?
item.dc:creator: @sone14 sone14
item.description:
@sone14 wrote:

my thing is set up like:
/npcdrop = (NPCID) (ITEMID) (ITEMAMOUNT) (HOWMANYTIMES!)/

/King Black dragon/
npcdrop = 50 1747 1 100
npcdrop = 50 4675 1 2
npcdrop = 50 1540 1 15
npcdrop = 50 1149 1 2
npcdrop = 50 2577 1 2
npcdrop = 50 2581 1 3
npcdrop = 50 536 1 100
npcdrop = 50 16015 1 1

i want to make my ags drop like 1/1000 cuz in the shops its 1b and some players just get the items just like that from like 4 kills
